thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jasonrK8277WB
title: Great location!
text:
Great location (2 blocks from Times Square and around the corner from Book of Mormon theatre so easy to enter their ticket lottery), rooms were clean, complementary internet worked flawless. Staff were knowledgeable- booked car service for us for our return to LaGuardia that was cheaper than a cab. Would definitely stay here again.
Just be careful which Hilton Garden Inn Times Square you book - if you can believe it , there are 2 in Manhattan (seems ridiculous to me). We got the one we wanted and were very happy!
